subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Had South Africa hung on for that last 15 minutes in the second test in Calcutta, it would have won the two-match series, with a victory and a draw, and taken over at the top of the world rankings.
snippet: Had South Africa hung on for that last 15 minutes in the second test in Calcutta, it would have won the two-match series, with a victory and a draw, and taken over at the top of the world rankings.
